code: import React from"react";import Button from"@material-ui/core/Button";import Loading from"../Loading";import EmptyState from"../EmptyState";var EmptyTable=function EmptyTable(props){var isLoading=props.isLoading,tableHeight=props.tableHeight,addRow=props.addRow;if(isLoading)return React.createElement(Loading,{message:"Fetching rows"});else return React.createElement("div",{style:{height:tableHeight,textAlign:"center",backgroundColor:"#eee",padding:"100px"}},React.createElement(EmptyState,{message:"No data to show"}),React.createElement(Button,{onClick:function onClick(){addRow();}},"Add Row"));};export default EmptyTable;
